name: GeometRythm
description:
Preview version to share before the end of the JAM

Pitch

Move And Shoot in Rythm in a Geometric Techno World !

Made in 7 days for Rythm Jam Theme : Every Beat Controls

Use arrows to move

Space to shoot ( when weapon equipped)

/!\ All controls have to be pressed on tempo ;)

Inspiration

Inspired by the awesome Crypt of the NecroDancer and other rythm game

Credits

The songs used are credited in each level

Known issues

There are some things I don't have time to fix, like a better menu with player progression, and a button to quit game (Alt + F4 is your friend).

There are minor bugs like ennemies that are sometimes on  same case,

I will try to fix that before the end of the jam

Next steps

- More levels and improved Level design

- Combo mechanism with super power

- More weapons

- More traps

If you love the game, feel free to say it on the comment. It can motivate me to transform that to a real game !
